info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 30 at 1:52AM CDT until April 30 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CRAIG AND CENTRAL NOWATA COUNTIES... At 152 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Edna to 3 miles west of Delaware, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Delaware... Lenapah... Hollow... Centralia... Centrailia... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
